menuItems.name: Citrus Mint Green Tea | Zimbabwe Hearts African Tea
menuItems.description: Learn the art of tea tasting and create your own tea blends to take home with you. Our famous blending workshops include unlimited drinks & tea to enjoy at our store. Bring a tea lover as a unique gift experience or come along alone & meet new friends that have book for same date.

menuItems.name: AFRICAN TEA BLENDING & TASTING EXPERIENCE - Per person.
menuItems.description: Nicely balanced and flavorful citrus mint tea with a well-hidden green tea base. No grassy or vegetal flavor peeking out anywhere, just lemon and orange flavors teaming up with a gentle mint taste to deliver a refreshing summer cuppa that is pleasant sip after sip.

menuItems.name: East African Food and Beverage experience
menuItems.description: Tea Masala with Maandazi Kick off the event with a tantalizing taste of Tea Masala paired perfectly with freshly made Maandazi at Asami.

menuItems.name: West African Food and Beverage Experience
menuItems.description: Tea and Coffee Tasting with African snack and Vegan option (Chin chin)Embark on a journey of flavor with our curated selection of West African pilau, perfectly complemented by traditional snacks

menuItems.description: Enjoy Our Famously Made Meat pie mixed with African Spices
